subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Daryl Homer, 25, ranked sixth in the world in saber fencing, is a favorite to become the first American man to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.
snippet: Daryl Homer, 25, ranked sixth in the world in saber fencing, is a favorite to become the first American man to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.
